title: How to repair my mouse wire - Quora

response.answer_text: dont know what is wrong repair will involve dismantling and resoldering the mouse and you may need a new usb cable most standard mice are very cheap dont repair buy another
Tools you will need is a soldering iron a screwdriver & a multimeter if you don't know how to master them tools I would very much recommend to purchase a new mouse as they are so cheap.
